title: (x) "Joanne's" bold connected script - Ariston {David H}
content:
Please tell me the name of this font...  
Thank you

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20070808124044im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Joanne.jpg)

 [‹ (x) Oil tankers on the New Jersey Turnpike - custom painted (similar to Futura, Century Gothic) {Yves}](http://web.archive.org/web/20070808124044/http:/typophile.com/node/19325 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) "Polyparty" Bauhaus geometric sans - Bernebeats {Tiff} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20070808124044/http:/typophile.com/node/19259 "Go to next forum topic")
author: misalion

comments.content: Don’t know, but you might dig [FF Danubia Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20070808124044/http:/www.fontshop.com/showfont.cfm?fid=FF.11341.6.17).
I’ll add that this typeface has been most successfully used by Vaughn Oliver.
